Articles.Content:
One revert

One Quickload

One Stranded Kerbal.

Success.

Nice job!  I used a lunar lander with return trip.  I enjoy these types of missions.  I'm looking forward to dev's implementation of science and tech trees to give "spoils" to these journeys.   My first attempt at a 4 staged mun run, the camera kept panning to debris after deployment of the stages.  This made it difficult to get into space, and re-entry to Kerbal.  Sometimes skipping the count down sequence would just leave the ship "dead" and engines don't even start.  We got a long way to go for occupying other planets.
Yeah, I've got a capture of spinning into the depths of the ocean after turning off SAS at splashdown. I still marked it as a success, lol.
